**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 26 --- With a wresting of will, you siphon off a creature's mental energy to replenish your own. One non-[mindless](/Traits.aspx?ID=108) creature within 30 feet must attempt a Will save against your spell DC. **Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Failure** The creature is [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) for 1 minute, and you regain 1 Focus Point, up to your normal maximum. You can't use Brain Drain again until after the next time you make your daily preparations.
**Critical Failure** As failure, but the creature is stupefied 2.
name: Brain Drain
